option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>ANK Elite Wealth - Financial Planning & Wealth Management</title>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #2c3e50;
            background-color: #f8f9fa;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        /* Navigation */
        nav {
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #2c3e50;
            padding: 1rem 0;
            position: fixed;
            width: 100%;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
        }

        nav .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 2rem;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        nav .logo {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #2c3e50;
        }

        nav .logo-icon {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b, #d97706);
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .mobile-menu-btn {
            display: none;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 0.5rem;
        }

        .mobile-menu {
            display: none;
            position: fixed;
            top: 70px;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            background: white;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            z-index: 999;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
        }

        .mobile-menu.active {
            max-height: 500px;
        }

        .mobile-menu ul {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 1rem;
        }

        .mobile-menu li {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .mobile-menu a {
            display: block;
            padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: background 0.3s;
        }

        .mobile-menu a:hover {
            background: #f5f5f5;
        }

        .mobile-menu .nav-btn {
            margin-top: 0.5rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        nav ul {
            list-style: none;
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        nav a {
            color: #2c3e50;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s;
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        nav a:hover {
            color: #f59e0b;
        }

        .nav-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b, #d97706);
            color: white;
            padding: 0.6rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .nav-btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d97706, #b45309);
            color: white;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            background: #f5f5f5;
            padding: 120px 2rem 80px;
            margin-top: 70px;
        }

        .hero-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .hero-content-left {
            text-align: left;
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1.2;
        }

        .hero .highlight {
            color: #d97706;
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.05rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            color: #4b5563;
            font-weight: 400;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }

        .hero-features {
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }

        .feature-item-hero {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            gap: 0.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
        }

        .check-icon {
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            background: #f59e0b;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .delivery-box {
            background: #e5e7eb;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }

        .delivery-box h3 {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .delivery-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 0.75rem;
        }

        .delivery-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            color: #4b5563;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .bullet {
            color: #f59e0b;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
        }

        .hero-content-right {
            position: relative;
        }

        .portfolio-card {
            background: #fef3e2;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            position: relative;
        }

        .rupee-icon {
            position: absolute;
            top: 2rem;
            right: 2rem;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: #fff;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #f59e0b;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .portfolio-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .card-subtitle {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #6b7280;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .chart-wrapper {
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }

        .stats-row {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 2rem;
        }

        .stat-item-hero {
            flex: 1;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .stat-icon {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .stat-number {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: #f59e0b;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        .growth-icon {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 2rem;
            right: 2rem;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #fff;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        /* WhatsApp Floating Button */
        .whatsapp-float {
            position: fixed;
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            bottom: 40px;
            right: 40px;
            background-color: #25d366;
            color: #FFF;
            border-radius: 50px;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 30px;
            box-shadow: 2px 2px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
            z-index: 1001;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }

        .whatsapp-float:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
            box-shadow: 2px 2px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0% {
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.7);
            }
            70% {
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 15px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0);
            }
            100% {
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(37, 211, 102, 0);
            }
        }

        .hero-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-top: 2rem;
        }

        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b, #d97706);
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            font-size: 1rem;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d97706, #b45309);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: white;
            color: #d97706;
            border: 2px solid #d97706;
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: #fef3c7;
        }

        /* Container */
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 2rem;
        }

        .section {
            padding: 80px 2rem;
        }

        .section-title {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-weight: 800;
        }

        .section-subtitle {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
            color: #6b7280;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features {
            background: #ffffff;
        }

        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 3rem;
        }

        .feature-card {
            background: white;
            padding: 2rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: #f59e0b;
        }

        .feature-icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: #fef3c7;
            border-radius: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            color: #2c3e50;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .feature-card p {
            color: #6b7280;
            line-height: 1.6;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        /* Services Section */
        .services {
            background: #f9fafb;
        }

        .services-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .service-card {
            background: white;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }

        .service-card:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }

        .service-icon {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .service-card h3 {
            color: #1a1a1a;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.3rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .service-card p {
            color: #6b7280;
            line-height: 1.7;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        /* Calculator Section */
        .calculator-section {
            background: #f8f9fa;
            padding: 80px 2rem;
        }

        .calculators-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 3rem;
        }

        .calculator-card {
            background: white;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: 16px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
        }

        .calculator-icon {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: #fef3c7;
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .calculator-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .calculator-card p {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: #6b7280;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .calc-input-group {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .calc-input-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .calc-input-group input,
        .calc-input-group select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
            border: 1px solid #d1d5db;
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            transition: border-color 0.3s;
            background: white;
        }

        .calc-input-group input:focus,
        .calc-input-group select:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #f59e0b;
        }

        .calc-btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0.9rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b, #d97706);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }

        .calc-btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d97706, #b45309);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .calc-result {
            background: #fef3c7;
            padding: 2rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            margin-top: 2rem;
            border: 2px solid #f59e0b;
        }

        .calc-result h4 {
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .calc-result-value {
            font-size: 2rem;
            color: #d97706;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .calc-result-detail {
            color: #6b7280;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            margin-top: 0.5rem;
        }

        .chart-container {
            margin-top: 2rem;
            background: white;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        /* Stats Section */
        .stats-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b, #d97706);
            color: white;
            padding: 60px 2rem;
        }

        .stats-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 3rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .stat-item h3 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .stat-item p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* Testimonials */
        .testimonials {
            background: #f9fafb;
        }

        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            background: white;
            padding: 2rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
        }

        .testimonial-text {
            color: #4b5563;
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-style: italic;
        }

        .testimonial-author {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }

        .author-avatar {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: #eff6ff;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #2563eb;
        }

        .author-info h4 {
            color: #1a1a1a;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .author-info p {
            color: #6b7280;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
        }

        /* CTA Section */
        .cta-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e40af 0%, #2563eb 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 80px 2rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .cta-section h2 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-weight: 800;
        }

        .cta-section p {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.95;
        }

        .btn-white {
            background: white;
            color: #2563eb;
        }

        .btn-white:hover {
            background: #f9fafb;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        /* Footer */
        footer {
            background: #1f2937;
            color: #9ca3af;
            padding: 60px 2rem 30px;
        }

        .footer-content {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .footer-section h3 {
            color: white;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .footer-section ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .footer-section ul li {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .footer-section a {
            color: #9ca3af;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s;
        }

        .footer-section a:hover {
            color: #2563eb;
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            text-align: center;
            padding-top: 2rem;
            border-top: 1px solid #374151;
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            nav .container {
                padding: 0 1rem;
            }

            nav .logo {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }

            nav .logo-icon {
                width: 35px;
                height: 35px;
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            nav ul {
                display: none;
            }

            .mobile-menu-btn {
                display: block;
            }

            .mobile-menu {
                display: block;
            }

            .hero {
                padding: 100px 1.5rem 60px;
            }

            .hero-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 2rem;
            }

            .hero-content-left {
                order: 1;
            }

            .hero-content-right {
                order: 2;
            }

            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2rem;
                line-height: 1.2;
                margin-bottom: 1rem;
            }

            .hero p {
                font-size: 0.95rem;
                margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            }

            .hero-features {
                margin: 1.5rem 0;
            }

            .feature-item-hero {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
                margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            }

            .check-icon {
                width: 20px;
                height: 20px;
                font-size: 0.75rem;
            }

            .delivery-box {
                padding: 1.25rem;
                margin: 1.5rem 0;
            }

            .delivery-box h3 {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }

            .delivery-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 0.5rem;
            }

            .delivery-item {
                font-size: 0.85rem;
            }

            .portfolio-card {
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }

            .rupee-icon {
                width: 40px;
                height: 40px;
                font-size: 1.2rem;
                top: 1.5rem;
                right: 1.5rem;
            }

            .portfolio-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }

            .card-subtitle {
                font-size: 0.85rem;
            }

            .stats-row {
                gap: 1rem;
            }

            .stat-number {
                font-size: 1.4rem;
            }

            .stat-label {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
            }

            .growth-icon {
                width: 35px;
                height: 35px;
                font-size: 1rem;
                bottom: 1.5rem;
                right: 1.5rem;
            }

            .hero-buttons {
                flex-direction: column;
                gap: 0.75rem;
            }

            .btn, .btn-secondary {
                width: 100%;
                padding: 0.9rem 1.5rem;
                font-size: 0.95rem;
            }

            .section {
                padding: 60px 1.5rem;
            }

            .section-title {
                font-size: 1.75rem;
                margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            }

            .section-subtitle {
                font-size: 0.95rem;
                margin-bottom: 2rem;
            }

            .features-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1.5rem;
            }

            .feature-card {
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }

            .feature-icon {
                width: 50px;
                height: 50px;
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }

            .feature-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }

            .feature-card p {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            .services-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1.5rem;
            }

            .service-card {
                padding: 2rem;
            }

            .service-icon {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }

            .service-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }

            .service-card p {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            .calculator-section {
                padding: 60px 1.5rem;
            }

            .calculators-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1.5rem;
            }

            .calculator-card {
                padding: 2rem;
            }

            .calculator-icon {
                width: 45px;
                height: 45px;
                font-size: 1.3rem;
            }

            .calculator-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.3rem;
            }

            .calculator-card p {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
                margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            }

            .calc-input-group {
                margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
            }

            .calc-input-group label {
                font-size: 0.85rem;
            }

            .calc-input-group input,
            .calc-input-group select {
                padding: 0.7rem 0.9rem;

            .whatsapp-float {
                width: 55px;
                height: 55px;
                bottom: 25px;
                right: 25px;
                font-size: 28px;
            }
        }

        /* Extra small mobile devices */
        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            nav .logo {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            nav .logo-icon {
                width: 32px;
                height: 32px;
                font-size: 0.8rem;

            }

            .delivery-item {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
            }

            .portfolio-card {
                padding: 1.25rem;
            }

            .section {
                padding: 50px 1rem;
            }

            .section-title {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }

            .section-subtitle {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            .stats-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1.5rem;
            }

            .calculator-card {
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }

            .calc-result-value {
                font-size: 1.3rem;
            }

            .whatsapp-float {
                width: 50px;
                height: 50px;
                bottom: 20px;
                right: 20px;
                font-size: 25px;
            }
        }

        /* Tablet landscape */
        @media (min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-container {
                gap: 3rem;
            }

            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }

            .calculators-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }

            .services-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }

        /* Improve touch targets for mobile */
        @media (hover: none) and (pointer: coarse) {
            a, button, .btn, .calc-btn {
                min-height: 44px;
                min-width: 44px;
            }

            nav a {
                padding: 0.5rem;
            }

            .calc-input-group input,
            .calc-input-group select {
                font-size: 16px; /* Prevents iOS zoom on focus */
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

    <script>
        // Mobile Menu Toggle
        function toggleMobileMenu() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            menu.classList.toggle('active');
        }

        function closeMobileMenu() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            menu.classList.remove('active');
        }

        // Close mobile menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            const menuBtn = document.querySelector('.mobile-menu-btn');
            const isClickInside = menu.contains(event.target) || menuBtn.contains(event.target);
            
            if (!isClickInside && menu.classList.contains('active')) {
                menu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });

        // Portfolio Growth Chart
        function createPortfolioChart() {
            const ctx = document.getElementById('portfolioChart');
            if (ctx) {
                new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'bar',
                    data: {
                        labels: ['Y1', 'Y2', 'Y3', 'Y4', 'Y5'],
                        datasets: [{
                            label: 'Portfolio Value',
                            data: [100000, 150000, 225000, 320000, 450000],
                            backgroundColor: '#f59e0b',
                            borderRadius: 8,
                            barThickness: 40
                        }]
                    },
                    options: {
                        responsive: true,
                        maintainAspectRatio: true,
                        plugins: {
                            legend: {
                                display: false
                            },
                            tooltip: {
                                callbacks: {
                                    label: function(context) {
                                        return '₹' + context.parsed.y.toLocaleString('en-IN');
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        },
                        scales: {
                            y: {
                                beginAtZero: true,
                                ticks: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                grid: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                border: {
                                    display: false
                                }
                            },
                            x: {
                                grid: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                ticks: {
                                    color: '#6b7280',
                                    font: {
                                        size: 11,
                                        weight: '500'
                                    }
                                },
                                border: {
                                    display: false
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        // SIP Calculator
        function calculateSIP() {
            const monthly = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipMonthly').value);
            const years = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipPeriod').value);
            const rate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipReturn').value);

            const months = years * 12;
            const monthlyRate = rate / 12 / 100;

            const futureValue = monthly * (((Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months) - 1) / monthlyRate) * (1 + monthlyRate));
            const invested = monthly * months;
            const returns = futureValue - invested;

            document.getElementById('sipInvested').textContent = '₹' + invested.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('sipReturns').textContent = '₹' + returns.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('sipMaturity').textContent = '₹' + futureValue.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('sipResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // Retirement Calculator
        function calculateRetirement() {
            const monthlyNeed = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireNeed').value);
            const yearsToRetire = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireYears').value);
            const inflation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireInflation').value) / 100;
            const returnRate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireReturn').value) / 100;

            // Calculate future monthly need considering inflation
            const futureMonthlyNeed = monthlyNeed * Math.pow(1 + inflation, yearsToRetire);

            // Assuming 25 years of retirement
            const retirementYears = 25;

            // Calculate required corpus using present value of annuity
            const monthlyReturnRate = returnRate / 12;
            const retirementMonths = retirementYears * 12;
            const requiredCorpus = futureMonthlyNeed * ((1 - Math.pow(1 + monthlyReturnRate, -retirementMonths)) / monthlyReturnRate);

            // Calculate monthly SIP required
            const monthsToRetire = yearsToRetire * 12;
            const monthlyRate = returnRate / 12;
            const monthlySIP = requiredCorpus / (((Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, monthsToRetire) - 1) / monthlyRate) * (1 + monthlyRate));

            document.getElementById('retireCorpus').textContent = '₹' + requiredCorpus.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('retireSIP').textContent = '₹' + monthlySIP.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('retireResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // SWP Calculator
        function calculateSWP() {
            const corpus = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpCorpus').value);
            const years = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpPeriod').value);
            const returnRate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpReturn').value) / 100;

            const months = years * 12;
            const monthlyRate = returnRate / 12;

            // Calculate monthly withdrawal using PMT formula
            const monthlyWithdrawal = corpus * (monthlyRate * Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months)) / (Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months) - 1);
            const totalWithdrawal = monthlyWithdrawal * months;

            // Calculate remaining corpus (should be close to 0 if withdrawn over entire period)
            let remainingCorpus = corpus;
            for (let i = 0; i < months; i++) {
                remainingCorpus = remainingCorpus * (1 + monthlyRate) - monthlyWithdrawal;
            }
            remainingCorpus = Math.max(0, remainingCorpus); // Ensure not negative

            document.getElementById('swpMonthly').textContent = '₹' + monthlyWithdrawal.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('swpTotal').textContent = '₹' + totalWithdrawal.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('swpRemaining').textContent = '₹' + remainingCorpus.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('swpResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // Smooth scrolling
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // Calculate on page load
        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            createPortfolioChart();
            calculateSIP();
            calculateRetirement();
            calculateSWP();
        });

        // Auto-recalculate on input change
        document.getElementById('sipMonthly').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);
        document.getElementById('sipPeriod').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);
        document.getElementById('sipReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);

        document.getElementById('retireNeed').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireYears').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireInflation').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);

        document.getElementById('swpCorpus').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
        document.getElementById('swpPeriod').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
        document.getElementById('swpReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>

        /* WhatsApp Floating Button */

        .chart-container {

        /* Stats Section */
        .stats-section {

        /* Testimonials */
        .testimonials {

        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));

        .testimonial-card {

        .testimonial-text {
            color: #4b5563;

        }

        .testimonial-author {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }

        .author-avatar {
            width: 50px;

            border-radius: 50%;

        .author-info h4 {
            color: #1a1a1a;

            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .author-info p {
            color: #6b7280;

        }

        /* CTA Section */
        .cta-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e40af 0%, #2563eb 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 80px 2rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .cta-section h2 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;

        }

        .cta-section p {

        .btn-white {

        .btn-white:hover {

        /* Footer */
        footer {
            background: #1f2937;

        .footer-content {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .footer-section h3 {
            color: white;

    <section class="section calculator-section" id="calculator">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="section-title">Financial Calculators</h2>
            <p class="section-subtitle">Plan your financial future with our precision calculators designed for informed decision-making.</p>

            <div class="calculators-grid">
                <!-- SIP Calculator -->
                <div class="calculator-card">
                    <div class="calculator-icon"></div>
                    <h3>SIP Calculator</h3>
                    <p>Calculate your SIP future value</p>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="sipMonthly">Monthly SIP Amount (₹)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="sipMonthly" value="5000" min="500" step="500">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="sipPeriod">Investment Period (Years)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="sipPeriod" value="10" min="1" max="40">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="sipReturn">Expected Return (%)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="sipReturn" value="12" min="1" max="30" step="0.5">
                    </div>

                    <button class="calc-btn" onclick="calculateSIP()">Calculate</button>

                    <div class="calc-result" id="sipResult" style="display: none;">
                        <h4>Investment Summary</h4>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Total Investment</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="sipInvested">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Estimated Returns</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="sipReturns">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Maturity Value</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="sipMaturity">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Retirement Corpus Calculator -->
                <div class="calculator-card">
                    <div class="calculator-icon"></div>
                    <h3>Retirement Corpus</h3>
                    <p>Plan your retirement corpus and SIP</p>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="retireNeed">Monthly Need Today (₹)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="retireNeed" value="50000" min="10000" step="5000">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="retireYears">Years to Retire</label>
                        <input type="number" id="retireYears" value="25" min="1" max="40">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="retireInflation">Inflation Rate (%)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="retireInflation" value="6" min="1" max="15" step="0.5">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="retireReturn">Expected Return (%)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="retireReturn" value="12" min="1" max="30" step="0.5">
                    </div>

                    <button class="calc-btn" onclick="calculateRetirement()">Calculate</button>

                    <div class="calc-result" id="retireResult" style="display: none;">
                        <h4>Retirement Plan</h4>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Required Corpus</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="retireCorpus">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Monthly SIP Required</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="retireSIP">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- SWP Calculator -->
                <div class="calculator-card">
                    <div class="calculator-icon"></div>
                    <h3>SWP Planner</h3>
                    <p>Calculate safe withdrawal amount</p>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="swpCorpus">Corpus Amount (₹)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="swpCorpus" value="10000000" min="100000" step="100000">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="swpPeriod">Withdrawal Period (Years)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="swpPeriod" value="20" min="1" max="40">
                    </div>

                    <div class="calc-input-group">
                        <label for="swpReturn">Expected Return (%)</label>
                        <input type="number" id="swpReturn" value="8" min="1" max="20" step="0.5">
                    </div>

                    <button class="calc-btn" onclick="calculateSWP()">Calculate</button>

                    <div class="calc-result" id="swpResult" style="display: none;">
                        <h4>Withdrawal Plan</h4>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Monthly Withdrawal</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="swpMonthly">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Total Withdrawal</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="swpTotal">₹0</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 1rem 0;">
                            <div style="color: #6b7280; font-size: 0.9rem;">Remaining Corpus</div>
                            <div class="calc-result-value" id="swpRemaining">₹0</div>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <script>
        // Mobile Menu Toggle
        function toggleMobileMenu() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            menu.classList.toggle('active');
        }

        function closeMobileMenu() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            menu.classList.remove('active');
        }

        // Close mobile menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobileMenu');
            const menuBtn = document.querySelector('.mobile-menu-btn');
            const isClickInside = menu.contains(event.target) || menuBtn.contains(event.target);
            
            if (!isClickInside && menu.classList.contains('active')) {
                menu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });

        // Portfolio Growth Chart
        function createPortfolioChart() {
            const ctx = document.getElementById('portfolioChart');
            if (ctx) {
                new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'bar',
                    data: {
                        labels: ['Y1', 'Y2', 'Y3', 'Y4', 'Y5'],
                        datasets: [{
                            label: 'Portfolio Value',
                            data: [100000, 150000, 225000, 320000, 450000],
                            backgroundColor: '#f59e0b',
                            borderRadius: 8,
                            barThickness: 40
                        }]
                    },
                    options: {
                        responsive: true,
                        maintainAspectRatio: true,
                        plugins: {
                            legend: {
                                display: false
                            },
                            tooltip: {
                                callbacks: {
                                    label: function(context) {
                                        return '₹' + context.parsed.y.toLocaleString('en-IN');
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        },
                        scales: {
                            y: {
                                beginAtZero: true,
                                ticks: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                grid: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                border: {
                                    display: false
                                }
                            },
                            x: {
                                grid: {
                                    display: false
                                },
                                ticks: {
                                    color: '#6b7280',
                                    font: {
                                        size: 11,
                                        weight: '500'
                                    }
                                },
                                border: {
                                    display: false
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        // SIP Calculator
        function calculateSIP() {
            const monthly = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipMonthly').value);
            const years = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipPeriod').value);
            const rate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sipReturn').value);

            const months = years * 12;
            const monthlyRate = rate / 12 / 100;

            const futureValue = monthly * (((Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months) - 1) / monthlyRate) * (1 + monthlyRate));
            const invested = monthly * months;
            const returns = futureValue - invested;

            document.getElementById('sipInvested').textContent = '₹' + invested.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('sipReturns').textContent = '₹' + returns.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('sipMaturity').textContent = '₹' + futureValue.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('sipResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // Retirement Calculator
        function calculateRetirement() {
            const monthlyNeed = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireNeed').value);
            const yearsToRetire = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireYears').value);
            const inflation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireInflation').value) / 100;
            const returnRate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('retireReturn').value) / 100;

            // Calculate future monthly need considering inflation
            const futureMonthlyNeed = monthlyNeed * Math.pow(1 + inflation, yearsToRetire);

            // Assuming 25 years of retirement
            const retirementYears = 25;

            // Calculate required corpus using present value of annuity
            const monthlyReturnRate = returnRate / 12;
            const retirementMonths = retirementYears * 12;
            const requiredCorpus = futureMonthlyNeed * ((1 - Math.pow(1 + monthlyReturnRate, -retirementMonths)) / monthlyReturnRate);

            // Calculate monthly SIP required
            const monthsToRetire = yearsToRetire * 12;
            const monthlyRate = returnRate / 12;
            const monthlySIP = requiredCorpus / (((Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, monthsToRetire) - 1) / monthlyRate) * (1 + monthlyRate));

            document.getElementById('retireCorpus').textContent = '₹' + requiredCorpus.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('retireSIP').textContent = '₹' + monthlySIP.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('retireResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // SWP Calculator
        function calculateSWP() {
            const corpus = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpCorpus').value);
            const years = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpPeriod').value);
            const returnRate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('swpReturn').value) / 100;

            const months = years * 12;
            const monthlyRate = returnRate / 12;

            // Calculate monthly withdrawal using PMT formula
            const monthlyWithdrawal = corpus * (monthlyRate * Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months)) / (Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, months) - 1);
            const totalWithdrawal = monthlyWithdrawal * months;

            // Calculate remaining corpus (should be close to 0 if withdrawn over entire period)
            let remainingCorpus = corpus;
            for (let i = 0; i < months; i++) {
                remainingCorpus = remainingCorpus * (1 + monthlyRate) - monthlyWithdrawal;
            }
            remainingCorpus = Math.max(0, remainingCorpus); // Ensure not negative

            document.getElementById('swpMonthly').textContent = '₹' + monthlyWithdrawal.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('swpTotal').textContent = '₹' + totalWithdrawal.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });
            document.getElementById('swpRemaining').textContent = '₹' + remainingCorpus.toLocaleString('en-IN', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 });

            document.getElementById('swpResult').style.display = 'block';
        }

        // Smooth scrolling
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // Calculate on page load
        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            createPortfolioChart();
            calculateSIP();
            calculateRetirement();
            calculateSWP();
        });

        // Auto-recalculate on input change
        document.getElementById('sipMonthly').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);
        document.getElementById('sipPeriod').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);
        document.getElementById('sipReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateSIP);

        document.getElementById('retireNeed').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireYears').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireInflation').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);
        document.getElementById('retireReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateRetirement);

        document.getElementById('swpCorpus').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
        document.getElementById('swpPeriod').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
        document.getElementById('swpReturn').addEventListener('input', calculateSWP);
    </script>
</body>
</html>
